docs.title: Vindicta Portal
docs.text:
The entry point for the Vindicta ecosystem.

The Vindicta Portal provides unified access to the platform's tools and community resources through a premium, responsive web interface.

docs.title: The Club
docs.text: Community hub for the Vindicta team: - Origins — Team history and mission - Creed — Code of conduct and values - Roster — Team member profiles

docs.title: The Platform
docs.text: Application gateway: - Dashboard — Central control panel - WARScribe — Battle notation interface - Meta-Oracle — AI predictions (coming soon) - Gas Tank — Usage management (coming soon)

docs.title: Architecture
docs.text: High-level design of the Vindicta Portal.

docs.title: Landing Page (/)
docs.text: Split-pane gateway directing users to Club or Platform sections.

docs.title: Club Section (/club/)
docs.text: Static HTML pages for community content: - Team information - Code of conduct - Event announcements

docs.title: Platform Section (/platform/)
docs.text: Application interface pages: - Dashboard for central control - WARScribe notation entry - Feature status indicators

docs.title: API Proxy (/api/*)
docs.text: Requests to /api/* are proxied to the backend service, enabling: - Dice rolling endpoints - Match data operations - User authentication (planned)

docs.title: Tech Stack
docs.text: Layer Technology Markup HTML5 Styling Tailwind CSS (CDN) Fonts Google Fonts (Outfit, Bebas Neue) Hosting Static file server API REST proxy to backend

docs.title: Design Principles
docs.text:
1. Static First — No client-side framework for core pages
  2. Progressive Enhancement — JS adds interactions, not content
  3. Mobile Responsive — Flexbox layouts, responsive breakpoints
  4. Dark Mode Default — Premium aesthetic for gaming audience

docs.title: Contributing
docs.text: Contribute to the Vindicta Portal.

docs.title: Development Setup
docs.text:
git clone https://github.com/vindicta-platform/Vindicta-Portal.git
cd Vindicta-Portal
npm run dev

docs.title: Code Style
docs.text:
• HTML: Semantic elements, accessible markup
  • CSS: Tailwind utility classes preferred
  • JS: Vanilla JavaScript, no frameworks for core pages

docs.title: Adding Pages
docs.text:
1. Create HTML file in appropriate directory (club/ or platform/)
  2. Include standard header/footer via portal-ui.js
  3. Follow existing page structure for consistency

docs.title: Pull Request Process
docs.text:
1. Fork the repository
  2. Create feature branch (feat/my-feature)
  3. Make changes with descriptive commits
  4. Open PR against main branch
  5. Await review

docs.title: Deployment
docs.text: Deployments are handled through the CI/CD pipeline. Merged PRs to main trigger automatic deployment.

docs.title: Assets
docs.text:
• Place images in static/images/
  • Use relative paths from HTML files
  • Optimize images before committing

docs.title: Getting Started
docs.text: Set up the Vindicta Portal for local development.

docs.title: Prerequisites
docs.text:
• Node.js 18+ (for local dev server)
  • Git

docs.title: Clone and Run
docs.text:
git clone https://github.com/vindicta-platform/Vindicta-Portal.git
cd Vindicta-Portal
npm run dev

Open http://localhost:3000 in your browser.

docs.title: Deployment
docs.text: The portal is deployed as a static site. See Contributing for deployment workflow.

docs.title: Local Testing
docs.text:
To test with API integration locally:

npm run serve

This uses the Firebase emulator for local API proxying.
